appetizers.name: Egg Roll
appetizers.description: Two pieces of egg rolls filled with pork, carrots, and mushrooms. The egg rolls come with our signature fish sauce.

appetizers.name: Spring Roll
appetizers.description: Two pieces of spring rolls containing beef, shrimp, noodle, and salad. It comes with our peanuts sauce.

appetizers.name: Shrimp Roll
appetizers.description: Two pieces of Shrimp rolls containing shrimp and salad. It comes with our peanuts sauce.

main.name: Chicken Pho
main.description: Vietnamese noodle soup with chicken, rice noodles, and herbs.

main.name: Bun Bo Hue
main.description: Spicy Vietnamese noodle soup with beef and pork.

main.name: Bun Thit Nuong
main.description: Vermicelli noodles with grilled pork, fresh herbs, and vegetables.

main.name: Com Thit Nuong
main.description: Grilled pork served with rice and fresh vegetables.

main.name: Com Ga Tot Mo
main.description: Chicken rice with fragrant pandan leaves and ginger.

main.name: Com Hang Quoc
main.description: Traditional Vietnamese rice with a variety of side dishes.

main.name: Com Ca
main.description: Grilled fish served with rice and fresh vegetables.

beverages.name: Vietnamese Iced Coffee
beverages.description: Strong iced coffee with sweetened condensed milk.

items.name: Thai Iced Tea
items.description: Sweet and creamy iced tea with milk.

items.name: Mango Boba Tea
items.description: Refreshing mango-flavored bubble tea with chewy tapioca pearls.

items.name: Avocado Boba Tea
items.description: Creamy avocado-flavored bubble tea with chewy tapioca pearls.

items.name: Strawberry Boba Tea
items.description: Sweet strawberry-flavored bubble tea with chewy tapioca pearls.

items.name: Coconut Boba Tea
items.description: Fragrant coconut-flavored bubble tea with chewy tapioca pearls.
